en.title: New Prices Effective 01st October 2009!
en.content:
Please note new pricing of the following:

Products that will take effect from 01st October 2009.

PRODUCT NEW PRICE
Quantum Pendant
Quantum Flask 
Quantum Bracelet
Resveratrol (RVT)

RM 595
RM 630
RM 625
RM 600 

Note: East Malaysia Price Add Additional RM 5 For Delivery.

FusionExcel has maintained it's pricing for the past 3 years since the launch of FE's Quantum Science products. Since then there has been increases in costs (product, packaging and logistics costs) that FusionExcel has been absorbing. Because of these increases in costs Management has decided on a small price increase of approximately 5%. The PVs remain the same.

FusionExcel will continue its track record of excellent service to our Members globally. We will continue to strongly support dedicated leaders to achieve success with FusionExcel and we will continue to have aggressive promotions, activities and marketing to increase our market share.

GOOD NEWS! FE's Business Pack, which is currently Buy 4 Get 3 Free, will be INCREASED to Buy 4 Get 4 Free from 01st October 2009!

MORE GOOD NEWS! Hari Raya Special Promotion @ MAEPs on 12th September 2009 will be Buy 4 QP Get 4 Quantum Pendants Free PLUS EXTRA FREE 5 Quantum Flasks! This promotion will be at current price of RM 2,252 per set of 4 Quantum Pendants.

FusionExcel would like to take this opportunity to THANK all our Leaders and Members for their support and dedication thus far and together we will build FusionExcel into the GREATEST Social Entrepreneur Platform in the world, providing long-term business opportunities and health benefits to millions and at the same time helping society through FE's "Hope For Children" Charity Program. There is no company like FusionExcel in the world!

Dated : 08th September 2009.
